attributes.contentHtml:
So i made discord[Snowy], it was first a reward discord then i rebranded it to minecraft server.
And i started making minecraft server then maple dms me and ask if he can be dev.
I said yes because i know him from bomb and he seemed cool to me
Then he made server and it was really cool and he asked to be manager and i trusted him and gave him manager, later on he asks to be owner and i give him because he made server and wanted to help.
Betwen that he was saying he will ddos me for acting like bitch and more horible stuff
Then when we opened server he started to act like shit he was against me and saying i have no idea what im doing
He gave co owner to some guy []Strafe.#1000] and i trusted
Then that co owner was saying that only maple and him are owners and shit like that
Then they removed my op and panel acces
i asked them to give it back but they didnt
Then i asked to peacfully remove owner from him because i didnt want to be owner with him
And i removed it
then they said they will give me acces and they will be nicer and i gave him owner back
then he added owner to 5 of his friends
he deleted channels
He would probably ban people if i didnt remove his role
Then he aplogized and i was in voice with him for 15 minutes
He was saying he is stupid for raiding and thata stuff
He asked to start again to make new dc with me
I said no of cours
Then he said i cant use world we have but that world was ours not his
And now he made annoucement to everoyone from bomb to put in their status [""RumGuru is scammer""]

So i will say this again
Maple is 13 year old kid, toxic , not profesional , swearing in bomb ticket, swearing at people from bomb/snowy
He says he will ddos people, if you dm me he grabs your ip so block him and watch out people
I hope this never happens to anyone
I loved bomb but now that i know how maple really is i dont like it

So if you have anymore questions dm me on discord [RumGuru#9999]
Or write here !!!
If you cant see screenshots join this discord
[https://discord.gg/2ps6WM5G7p]
I will delete that dc later its just so people can see all stuff he did
